entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 05:33 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
